message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $20,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you, and I'm happy to answer any questions you may have.
Hi Alice,  $20,000 is a bit out of my budget.  I'm really interested in this product, but I can only go up to $12,000.  What do you think?

Bob, thanks for your interest.  While $20,000 represents the high value of this product, I'm willing to come down to $18,000. I believe this offer still reflects a fair price for the benefits you'll gain.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price, but $18,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $15,000, which is a good value for both of us. What do you say?
